      • createBoard

        public void createBoard(int n,
                        int m,
                        int s,
                        int e,
                        java.lang.String players)
        The method creates the board for the game
        pre: The creation of the methods: setBoard, createSnakes, createLadders, connectNeighBours, connectUpAndDown and organizePlayerInSpaces post: The creation of a linked list that represents the board, with the players, snakes, and ladders on it
        Parameters:
        n, - the amount of rows the board has
        m, - the amount of columns the board has
        s, - the amount of snakes on the board
        e, - the amount of ladders on the board
        players, - the players in the game

      • createLadders

        public void createLadders(int numOfLadders)
        The method uses recursion to call the private method createLadders and then call itself, this creates the ladders on the board
        pre: At least 1 use of the method createBoard, and the creation of the private method createLadders post: Adds the ladders in the Space objects of the board
        Parameters:
        numOfLadders, - the number of ladders it has to add to the board, in the first recursion this value is equal to the field e

      • createSnakes

        public void createSnakes(int numOfSnakes)
        The method uses recursion to call the private method createSnakes and then call itself, this creates the snakes on the board
        pre: At least 1 use of the method createBoard, and the creation of the private method createSnakes post: Adds the snakes in the Space objects of the board
        Parameters:
        numOfSnakes, - the number of snakes it has to add to the board, in the first recursion this value is equal to the field s
